card.name: AUR DRAFT ARCHETYPES AUR
card.text: {W}{U} REVELATIONS Witness the majesty of the ascendant by turning your small creatures and spells into powerful combinations! {U}{B} SABOTEURS Predate the night by slinking past your opponent's blockers and going for the life total directly. {B}{R} AURORA CONTROL Play the long game as you remove threats, cast off-color spells and accrue value until your aurora is complete. {R}{G} AURORA MIDRANGE Beat your opponent down with on-curve threats then boost them all with your aurora! {G}{W} ABILITY COUNTERS Have your creatures share their abilities for the good of the collective as you capitalize off different counters. {W}{B} +1/+1 COUNTERS Scavenge the flesh of the dead to grow your threats. Your opponent's life total is next! {B}{G} GO-WIDE Grow your board before you infect them all with a fungal buff to swing for lethal. {G}{U} LANDS Put lands in your graveyard and onto the battlefield to cast your huge threats faster! {U}{R} SPELLSLINGER AGGRO Use elemental infusions to blast your opponent with spells before they can react. {R}{W} BLINK Aetherize and reuse your powerful enters effects until nobody can compete with the value.

card.text: Exile up to one target creature you control. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Search your library for an Eiyo card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Wei Ji's Judgement
card.text: All creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn. You gain 3 life. Search your library for a Ji card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Prowling Wolfshark
card.text: Flash This creature can't be blocked unless each other attacking creature you control is blocked. Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, surveil 2.

card.name: Celestial Swallower AUR
card.text: Aurora (When this enters and at your end step, this may exile a noncreature from your graveyard into your aurora. Each grants up to one of its colors.) Whenever this creature enters or attacks, create a 0/0 colorless Beast Avatar creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of colors in your aurora.

card.name: Unbreakable Ironhide
card.text: When a creature scavenges this creature, you may play it as long as it remains exiled. Scavenge {2}{B}{B} ({2}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Frostarmor Wolf
card.text: During your turn, this creature has first strike. Counters on other creatures you control are shield counters in addition to their other kinds. (If a creature would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a counter from it instead.)

card.name: Forgotten Idol
card.text: Cards outside the game can't enter the game. Activated abilities of planeswalkers cost an additional [-1] to activate. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color. Draw a card.

card.name: Herald the End
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep and whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a doom counter on this enchantment. Then if it has seven or more doom counters on it, sacrifice it and create three 1/1 blue Elemental creature tokens with prowess.

card.name: Florescence
card.text: For each land you don't control, create a tapped colorless land token named Everywhere that is every basic land type.

card.name: Perdition Mare
card.text: Whenever this creature enters or attacks, mill four cards. When you do, choose up to X, where X is the number of colors among cards milled this way. • This creature gains menace until end of turn. • Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. • Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. • Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. • You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Wei Ji of the Veil
card.text: [+1]: Surveil 2. If you mill a nonland card this way, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying. [0]: Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return a creature card with mana value less than or equal to the sacrificed creature's power to the battlefield. [-2]: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature you control.

card.name: Swamp Forest Token AUR
card.text: ({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)

card.name: Infected Touch
card.text: Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals combat damage to a player, that player loses 3 life unless they discard a card or sacrifice a nonland permanent.

card.name: Aetherflame Pouncer
card.text: If you would aetherize a creature, create a token that's a copy of it instead. That tokens gains haste. If it's your combat phase, it enters tapped and attacking. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Fall for the Bait
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to any nonplayer target. If excess damage was dealt this way, surveil 2.

card.name: Seek the Rift
card.text: Search your library for a instant or sorcery card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. If it's a Revelation, create a 2/2 blue Bear creature token.

card.name: Dandecrab
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. If this creature's power is 2 or greater, add {G}{G} instead.

card.name: Squirrel Token AUR
card.text: Vigilance

card.name: Simul's Exploration
card.text: Create a tapped colorless land token named Everywhere that is every basic land type. Search your library for a Simul card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Alexa, Whose Steps Blossom
card.text: Aurora (When this enters and at your end step, this may exile a noncreature from your graveyard into your aurora. Each grants up to one of its colors.) [+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. If your aurora has three or more colors, it gains vigilance, trample and haste until end of turn. [-2]: Choose a basic land type. Create a tapped basic land token with that type. [-2]: Create a 0/0 green Plant creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of colors in your aurora.

card.name: Rend and Tear
card.text: Rend and Tear deals X damage to any nonplayer target. Create a number of 2/1 red Crocodile creature tokens with menace and "This token can't block." equal to the amount of excess damage dealt this way.

card.name: Light Too Casts Shadow
card.text: Incarnate {2}{W}{B} (If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.) Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Lifelink Whenever this Revelation attacks, you may cast an unincarnated copy of it. (You still pay its costs.)

card.name: The Still Breeze Blows
card.text: Incarnate {4}{W} (If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.) Create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying. Flying

card.name: Alexa's Catharsis
card.text: Up to one target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn. Put a trample counter on it. Search your library for an Alexa card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Coruscating Lynx AUR
card.text: Aurora (When this enters and at your end step, this may exile a noncreature from your graveyard into your aurora. Each grants up to one of its colors.) Menace Whenever this creature attacks, you draw a card unless defending player pays X life, where X is the number of colors in your aurora.
